about_the_game:
"Kanji de GO! Shueisha Manga Festival"

The popular kanji quiz game "Kanji de GO!" teams up with Shueisha manga in a dream collaboration!

Challenge yourself with furigana quizzes featuring tricky kanji from a variety of Shueisha's classic and modern hit manga!

[Game Features]

A Grand Collection of Shueisha’s Iconic Manga!

Enjoy quizzes drawn from numerous beloved titles such as ONE PIECE, Jujutsu Kaisen, Oshi no Ko, and JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure! Immerse yourself in the manga universe while aiming to master furigana readings!

Learn While You Play with Furigana Quizzes

Even if you encounter unfamiliar readings, don’t worry! The results screen provides details on the title and context of the kanji, making it easy to revisit the manga and deepen your understanding while having fun.

Customizable Genres and Difficulty Levels

Choose your favorite genre and difficulty level. From beginners to kanji experts, anyone can enjoy this game at their own pace.

[How to Play]

  • Select your preferred genre, difficulty, and number of questions to begin!

  • Type in the correct reading for the furigana presented in each question.

  • Check out detailed manga information on the results screen!

Now, step up and become a furigana master!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: 漢字でGO! 集英社マンガ祭

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615Graphics or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The popular kanji quiz game "Kanji de GO!" teams up with Shueisha manga in a dream collaboration! Challenge yourself with furigana quizzes featuring tricky kanji from a wide range of Shueisha's classic and modern hit manga!
